hero.consultation_text: Get a consultation from our experts.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Innovative energy solutions based on renewable and sustainable energy sources.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc1: We continuously monitor global trends and technologies. We listen, learn, and seek the best ideas, striving to implement the latest approaches in our work processes. We believe that improvement is a continuous process, and we are never satisfied with what has been achieved.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.desc1: We understand that efficiency is the key factor in achieving successful results. Efficiency in time, decisions, and processes is equally important. That is why, during project implementation, each stage is given the utmost attention.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc1: We recognize that development and progress do not exist in a single aspect. There is no such thing as just one person's success in an organization. That is why integrity, teamwork, and a comprehensive approach are our top priorities.

planning.title: Planning
planning.desc1: Project planning and effective management are the strengths of our company. With 16 years of experience, we have developed approaches where, at the initial stage of the project, maximum attention is given to the calculation of material, technical, time, and human resources needed for each stage, ensuring that the project progresses sequentially and without interruption and is completed within the agreed timeframe.

funFact.titleHtml: Arali Group Stands Out for Reliability
funFact.description: With 20 years of operation, the company has built a strong reputation, trust, and respect. Our partners feel secure and confident when working with us.

faq.answer1: We are a construction company providing a full cycle – from design and planning to construction. We work on residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
faq.question2: What types of construction do you specialize in?
faq.answer2: We specialize in residential buildings, commercial spaces, and industrial projects. Our portfolio includes apartment buildings, office spaces, shopping centers, and other infrastructure developments.
faq.answer3: Yes, you can view our ongoing and completed projects on our website, or contact us for detailed information.

blog2.title: სპორტული კომპლექსი
blog2.author: შემსრულებელი: არალი ჯგუფი
blog2.introduction: This is an introduction about the sports complex.
blog2.content: Completed a new multi-functional sports complex in Rustavi...
blog2.accessibilityInfo: The complex is fully adapted for people with disabilities.

blogTwo.title: Sports Complex
blogTwo.introduction: We have completed the construction of a new multi-functional sports complex in Rustavi!
blogTwo.details: The two-story enclosed sports complex will serve 8 Olympic sports disciplines, specifically, events can be held in basketball, volleyball, handball, mini football, boxing, wrestling, judo, and fencing.
blogTwo.section1: The hall's retractable, so-called telescopic stands are designed for 1,500 spectators, allowing for efficient use of space.
blogTwo.section2: The hall is equipped according to international standards. For hosting competitions, LED screens have been installed. The building is equipped with heating, cooling, and ventilation systems.
blogTwo.section3: The sports complex already includes a fitness hall and provides all necessary spaces for athletes' training and local or international competitions: locker rooms, showers, rest areas, storage rooms, a conference hall, and an open café.
blogTwo.section4: A recreational zone has been arranged around the complex, along with pedestrian paths, an open parking lot for 85 cars, and installed outdoor lighting fixtures.
blogTwo.accessibility: The multi-functional sports complex is fully adapted for persons with disabilities.

about.experienceYears: has been actively involved for over 20 years
about.sectors: in the development of key economic sectors such as road and infrastructure construction.
about.supportClients: We help clients implement large-scale and complex projects that create long-term and sustainable legacies, contributing to the country's social and economic progress.
about.strategy: The group's successful experience is based on an efficient organizational and strategic vision, a dynamic entrepreneurial approach,
about.focusQuality: which is focused on quality and customer satisfaction.
about.techBase: Arali's material and technical base, along with strong project management, allows us to effectively execute projects of any complexity in parallel.
about.professionalTeam: The company's main asset is a professional team, whose years of experience and expertise ensure effective and successful project management. Arali also plays a key role in employing and developing local talent across Georgia.
about.waterSystems: Reservoirs, water purification plants, regulatory systems, and rehabilitation
about.sewageSystems: Water and sewage systems construction and rehabilitation
about.missionDescription: Our mission is to design and construct civil infrastructure projects that improve the quality of life for citizens.
about.goalDescription: Our goal is to become the leading group in the region, leveraging project management and engineering expertise in construction and engineering sectors.
about.valuesDescription: Every thought and action of our team is based on company values: teamwork, responsibility for quality, innovation, sustainable development, and environmental care.
about.heroTitle: Arali Group / Building More Than Structures
about.heroSubtitle: With over 20 years of active involvement in Georgia's key economic sectors, Arali Group specializes in large-scale infrastructure and civil construction projects. Backed by a strong technical base and efficient project management, we support clients in delivering complex, high-impact developments that contribute to long-term national growth and sustainability.

overview.title: Our Story
overview.description: Since our founding in 2003, Arali Group has been at the forefront of Georgia's construction industry. We've grown from a small local contractor to a leading construction company, delivering excellence in road construction, civil engineering, and concrete production. Our commitment to quality and innovation has earned us a reputation for reliability and excellence across the Caucasus region.

founding.title: Company Foundation
founding.description: Arali Group was established with a vision to transform Georgia's construction landscape through innovative solutions and quality craftsmanship.

expansion.title: Regional Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded operations across Georgia, establishing a strong presence in key regions and developing strategic partnerships.

innovation.title: Innovation & Growth
innovation.description: Introduced cutting-edge construction technologies and sustainable practices, setting new industry standards in the Caucasus region.

leadership.title: Industry Leadership
leadership.description: Achieved recognition as a leading construction company in the Caucasus, with a portfolio of landmark projects and international partnerships.

blog-details1.title: Road Rehabilitation
blog-details1.introduction: Rehabilitation works of Aspindza Street in Akhaltsikhe... Rehabilitation works of Aspindza Street in Akhaltsikhe aimed at improving road quality and traffic safety, ensuring long-term durability.
blog-details1.details: Road works included modern infrastructure implementation... Road works included modern infrastructure implementation, advanced paving techniques, and enhanced drainage systems to prevent flooding.
blog-details1.section1: All necessary traffic safety measures were taken... Speed limits, road signs, and pedestrian crossings were added to ensure better road safety.
blog-details1.section2: Drainage and paving work was performed... A high-quality drainage system was installed alongside a durable asphalt overlay for long-term road sustainability.
blog-details1.section3: Sidewalks and pedestrian crossings were improved... Wider sidewalks and improved pedestrian-friendly zones enhance accessibility for residents and tourists.
blog-details1.section4: The project was completed within the agreed time frame... Despite weather challenges, the project was delivered ahead of schedule, maintaining high construction standards.
blog-details1.coverImageAlt: Road Rehabilitation Cover Image - Project Success
blog-details1.image1: Before Road Repair - Old Infrastructure Challenges
blog-details1.accessibility: Infrastructure was improved for pedestrians and disabled individuals. New ramps, tactile paving, and accessibility features ensure inclusive urban development.

blog-details2.title: Road Clearing Operations in Georgia's Mountainous Regions
blog-details2.introduction: During winter, road clearing in Georgia's mountainous regions is essential for safe transportation. The operations involved removing snow and ice to ensure uninterrupted movement.
blog-details2.details: Modern equipment was used to maximize efficiency and respond quickly. Snowplows and special materials helped protect road surfaces from freezing.
blog-details2.section1: Safety measures were implemented, including road signs and salt solutions to reduce accident risks.
blog-details2.section2: High-performance machinery effectively cleared roads in extreme weather, minimizing travel disruptions.
blog-details2.section3: Operations ran 24/7 to maintain continuous transport connections for mountain communities.
blog-details2.section4: Despite challenging conditions, the project was completed on time, significantly improving road accessibility and safety.
blog-details2.image2: Clearing in progress - Heavy machinery at work
blog-details2.image3: Cleared road - Safe and accessible for travel
blog-details2.accessibility: The cleared roads restored mobility for both residents and tourists, playing a vital role in regional infrastructure development.

slide1.title: Leading the Way in Road Construction
slide1.description: With over 20 years of experience and more than 12,000 km of roads built and rehabilitated, Arali stands as a leader in Georgia's infrastructure development. Our projects combine speed, quality, and European-standard technology.

slide2.title: Solar That Works Smarter
slide2.description: We engineer and install solar systems built for performance—powering homes, businesses, and the future.

slide3.title: Quality Concrete Production
slide3.description: We specialize in producing high-performance concrete using certified raw materials and precise batching processes.

slide4.title: HIGH-TECH QUARRIES
slide4.description: Arali operates advanced sand and gravel quarries that supply top-grade construction materials. Strategically located, they ensure fast and efficient delivery for a wide range of projects, including concrete, asphalt, and road construction.

slide5.title: Reliable Fueling Infrastructure
slide5.description: From concept to completion, we build gas stations that meet today's energy demands with tomorrow's standards.

slide6.title: Vision Into Structures
slide6.description: From the initial sketches to the final finishing touches...

blogThree.title: Abastumani Urban Renewal
blogThree.executorName: Ministry of Regional Development and Infrastructure
blogThree.introduction: Major public infrastructure projects in Abastumani are in their final stages, marking a transformative period for the resort town.
blogThree.details: The redevelopment will highlight the natural potential of Abastumani while introducing modern elements. In parallel with public sector work, the private sector is actively involved with the construction of high-class hotels such as Rooms, Hilton, and Paragraph.
blogThree.section1: The construction of a parking facility at the entrance of the town is nearing completion. The lot will accommodate up to 770 vehicles and include electric vehicle charging stations.
blogThree.section2: Phase two of the urban renewal includes the rehabilitation of green and blue corridors — new walking and cycling paths, recreational and rest zones, and the restoration of central roads and other infrastructure.
blogThree.section3: Significant progress has already been made: 20 historic homes from the 19th–20th centuries, the 1932-built National Astrophysical Observatory, and the 1982 cable car line have been fully restored.
blogThree.section4: Austria is currently manufacturing a 1.5-meter telescope and 12-meter dome for the observatory. Roadwork continues on the Baghdati-Abastumani highway and the construction of the bypass road is underway.
blogThree.coverImageAlt: Abastumani Urban Renewal Project Cover Image
blogThree.accessibility: The urban renewal projects include pedestrian-friendly and accessible infrastructure for persons with disabilities.

blogFour.title: Renewed Regions Program in Samtskhe-Javakheti
blogFour.executorName: Ministry of Regional Development and Infrastructure
blogFour.introduction: The first phase of the 'Renewed Regions' program in Samtskhe-Javakheti is nearing completion, with major infrastructure projects wrapping up across the region.
blogFour.details: The ongoing projects were visited by the Minister of Regional Development and Infrastructure, Irakli Karseladze, together with the State Representative Besik Amiranashvili and local municipal mayors.
blogFour.section1: In Akhaltsikhe, rehabilitation works are being finalized on Natenadze Street, Giorgi Brtskinvale Square, and six nearby parks. Additionally, central buildings in the city are undergoing restoration.
blogFour.section2: In Adigeni, the urban renewal of the central area is in its final phase, with the restoration of five buildings and the arrangement of adjacent green areas and pedestrian walkways along Tamar Mepe Street.
blogFour.section3: In Aspindza, the infrastructure surrounding the War Memorial and the triangular park has been fully rehabilitated. A new kindergarten for 180 children has also been built, including outdoor areas and fully equipped spaces for recreation, dining, and activities.
blogFour.section4: In Aspindza, the Municipal Development Fund is implementing a complete renovation of a public school designed for 600 students. The project includes all necessary upgrades—water supply, sewage, fire safety, heating, electricity, ventilation, classrooms, a sports field, and a redesigned schoolyard. Completion is expected this year.
blogFour.coverImageAlt: Cover image of the Renewed Regions project in Samtskhe-Javakheti
blogFour.image3: New kindergarten and school renovation in Aspindza
blogFour.accessibility: The projects ensure accessible infrastructure for all, including persons with disabilities.

blogFive.title: Kindergarten Renovation in Aspindza
blogFive.introduction: A new kindergarten has been successfully completed in Aspindza, providing a modern and child-friendly environment for up to 180 children.
blogFive.details: The project is part of the 'Renewed Regions' initiative and was implemented with the support of the Municipal Development Fund under the Ministry of Regional Development and Infrastructure.
blogFive.section1: The building includes age-appropriate classrooms, activity rooms, a dining area, restrooms, and administrative spaces — all fully adapted for children’s comfort and safety.
blogFive.section2: Spacious outdoor areas have been arranged for recreation and physical activities, ensuring a healthy environment for early development.
blogFive.section3: The kindergarten complies with modern safety, hygiene, and accessibility standards, including ramps, child-safe infrastructure, and fire safety systems.
blogFive.section4: Currently, the kindergarten is being equipped with furniture, educational tools, and toys, preparing it for full-scale operation and welcoming its first students.
blogFive.image1: Interior view of renovated kindergarten classrooms
blogFive.image3: Outdoor recreation area of the kindergarten
blogFive.accessibility: The facility is fully adapted for children and accessible to persons with disabilities.
